name: Ewok And Roll
Lore: 'Even an All Terrain Scout Transport cannot stand on all terrain.',
Text: 'If opponent''s creature vehicle or AT-ST just deployed or moved to where your Ewok is present, draw destiny. Creature vehicle lost if destiny > defense value. AT-ST crashed if destiny +2 > armor. OR If your Ewok is defending a battle, add 2 to your total power.',
